Suite1.Name: Validation of Test player functionality when all questions are skipped and then submitted

Suite2.Name: Validation of Test player functionality when quiz is closed and resumed

Suite3.Name: Validation of shuffling scenarios in the Order list question

Suite4.Name: Validate the test player functionality when user click Cancel icon in the header without performing the first question and then resume the quiz.

Suite5.Name: Validate the test player resume functionality when user perform any middle question (do not check) and then resume the quiz

Suite6.Name: Validate the test player resume functionality when user perform last question with Check My Work and then resume the quiz

Suite7.Name: Validation of Test player content in English

Suite8.Name: Validation of Test player content in Spanish

Suite9.Name: Validation of Failure Summary page content in English and Spanish

Suite10.Name: Validation of Failure Summary page content in English and Spanish
